meanings.sent1: She restretched the rubber band to make it longer.
meanings.sent2: After washing and drying the sweater, she restretched it to its original size.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally restretched the balloon too much, and it popped in his face!
meanings.sent4: The fabric of reality seemed to be restretched as the time loop continued.
meanings.sent5: The old canvas was restretched on the frame to prepare it for a new painting.

meanings.sent1: The elastic waistband restretched easily after being washed.
meanings.sent2: The rubber band restretched itself after being pulled taut.
meanings.sent3: The cat yawned and lazily restretched on the sunny windowsill.
meanings.sent4: The river seemed to restretch endlessly into the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The old rubber band had been restretched so many times, it was starting to lose its elasticity.
